front.title: Description of Load-Balancing and Communication Protocols Used by GNU Queue

abstract.t: This document describes the protocols used by GNU Queue to communicate between GNU Queue processes. This includes protocols used to facilitate network load-balancing (including reporting to GNU Queue processes of host load averages, 'virtual load averages', and/or other information used to determine job routing), process input-output, and process control information (two-way signal and termination code reporting).
